title: Demonocalypse
description: In an effort to regain his lost title as the Prince of Hell, Lucifer recruits four demons to masquerade as the Four Horsemen of the Famine, Pestilence, War, and Death. Archangel Michael, Angel Warriors Mihdael and Liftheon, and Angel Aleilah form the Heavenly Task Force sent to stop the Fake Four. Bound by their human forms, the Angels try to survive long enough on Earth to destroy the phony Horsemen, and defeat the powerful, unholy leader of the Old Ones taking on the mantle of Death. Join the Heavenly Task Force as they pursue the Fake Four from Texas, to Kansas, to Kentucky as they try to prevent an apocalyptic a Demonocalypse!
author: Melinda Reynolds
